casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF: A.E.C. 82PA15-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2017 Ms. Joyce L. Terres, Assistant Appellate Defender, for McCoy, James. Ms. Beth Hall, GAL Attorney Advocate, for GAL. Ms. Elizabeth Kennedy-Gurnee, Attorney at Law, Mr. Christopher L. Carr, Attorney at Law, Mr. James David Dill, Attorney at Law, for Cumberland County DSS.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of July 2017 by Respondent (Father) to Dismiss Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."
